name: Polyalia
description:
Description:

Made for the Epic Mega Jam 2020. (Theme: It's been a long time, but we're not done yet)

Battle it out with another player via LAN to see who's better at getting the ball in the opposite goal.

To win, you must have a 10 point lead. The theme of the jam shines through after playing several matches.

Controls:

Move: - W-A-S-D / Left Analog Stick

Camera: - Mouse / Right Analog Stick

Rotate Shape: - Q-E / Right & Left Shoulder Buttons

Dash: - When the green orb is above your shape: Spacebar / A Button

Team:

Casey Gatlin
